attributes.action: Government to overrule sadiq Khan from removing statues and renaming streets
attributes.additional_details: London mayor's come and go but London is the greatest capital city in the world, tourists and citizens of this country for its historic monuments and world famous streets that are known throughout the world for historic events that have occurred on them, kahn is behaving like a monarch instead of the elected mayor who only has a short term in the long history of the city.
attributes.background: Sadiq Khan does not own London, he is just another London mayor, he does not have the right to change the capital city of our country's history, a proud history that must be protected.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government aren't responsible for the decisions of the Mayor of London.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325814
